job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: I am hiring DataScientist in Seattle WA for a renowned pharmaceutuical clientbrbrQualification and Experiencebr	BS degree with 4 years of experience a MSc degree with 2 years of experience or a recent PhD in Statistics Biostatistics Computer Science Bioinformatics or similar fieldsbr	Strong desire to learn with an interest in immunooncology and cellular therapybr	Experienced in interdisciplinary collaborations at the interface of data science and life sciencesbr	Proficient in good coding practicesbr	Command of data science stack of tools RPython notebooks and gitbr	Experience with R Shiny Dash Plotly Streamlit or other reactive visualization frameworkbr	Experience with APIs or ability to quickly learn how to use them eg R httr or Python requestsbr	Experienced in data visualization and analyticsbr	Experienced in setting up data workflows that interface with diverse ecosystem of data platforms and APIsbr	Computing proficiency Base knowledge of Linux OS and interaction with cloudresources particularly AWSbrbrPreferred br	Experience with practicing Agilebr	Preferred Experience with clinical data practices and standardsbr	Preferred Experience working with omics andor flow cytometry databr	Preferred Experience with CICD framework and SQLbr
